frontmatter.title: Bearded Skull of the Night
frontmatter.excerpt: PaperFaces portrait of the Sus Pek drawn with Paper for iOS on an iPad.

markdownRemark.html:
PaperFaces portrait of Sus Pek inspired by a photograph on Sktchy.

I’m a sucker for dramatic lit faces and have more queued up than I have time to draw. This one in particular stuck out to me while listening to Xasthur on repeat. The skull like visage and grit found in the original image didn’t hurt either…

Tools used:

  • Pencil by FiftyThree
  • Paper for iOS
